item.description: It's been far too long since we've had a meetup, so let's get back in gear by talking about some cool Ruby projects. For starters we have a cool MacRuby project to showcase, but that's just the appetizer. Bring your projects and get ready to show off what you've been up to. This will be a great opportunity to showcase your own work, as well as share knowledge of the ins and outs of Rails. Pizzas, sodas, and beers will be served!
item.name: The Long Awaited "Next Boston Ruby on Rails Meetup"
